snippet: The New York City health department began a campaign to encourage hospitals to stop handing out free baby formula as a way to encourage breast-feeding, and several have signed up.
abstract: New York City health department begins campaign to encourage hospitals to stop handing out free baby formula, in an effort to push more mothers to breast-feed; 23 of the 40 hospitals in New York City that deliver babies have agreed they will not distribute free formula unless a mother requests it or a doctor orders it.
lead_paragraph: The New York City health department began a campaign to encourage hospitals to stop handing out free baby formula as a way to encourage breast-feeding, and several have signed up.

headline.seo: Free Baby Formula for Newborns Limited at New York City Hospitals
headline.main: Some Hospitals Will Curb Samples of Baby Formula
headline.print_headline: Some Hospitals Will Curb Samples of Baby Formula
